data.text: @KawaGoat @CEOofCOTE It has been in the works since 2020, but that doesn't necessarily mean they started animating back then. 86 was in the works since 2018 but COVID fucked them over and they had to struggle a lot even with split 23 episodes. Anything is possible nowadays

@Vegeroto13 @CEOofCOTE And like this post said, this has been in production since 2020 but because of the pandemic they delayed it so they should've already prepared for the last 2 years which is alot of time to be prepared

@Vegeroto13 @CEOofCOTE Idk about the LN readers but cote S1 animation wise is actually good, so i expect the same thing in s2 and s3, on the pacing though they said it's bad which I understand because they skip some things I think?
@KawaGoat @CEOofCOTE LMFAO yeah I want the best, but expect the absolute worst, so I'm prepping everyone
@Vegeroto13 @CEOofCOTE But fr, hoping for the best, need this to be atleast an anime of the year candidate if not anime of the year itself
@Vegeroto13 @CEOofCOTE Man, u are really wishing for the worst to happen 😂 like this is they evey tweet I see of u

@SamratPaul119 Yes 
Well 11.75 SS, it’s like 20 pages
@CEOofCOTE How many volume are there for cote y1 ? Is 11.5 ending of y1?

@CEOofCOTE Oh wow so we could’ve gotten it sooner but becos of covid?? 

Covid sucks fr
